channel.title: Murray|Salt Lake County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Murray|Salt Lake County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South Approaching Exit 298B-A
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 298B-A - I-215. Continue south on I-15 for Las Vegas (Nevada). I-215 is the Salt Lake City area belt route, and this is the southern part of the loop.

item.title: I-215 South at I-15 Split
item.description: I-215 south at I-15. Use right lane for I-15 South/Las Vegas; left lane for I-15 North/Salt Lake.

item.title: I-215 South - Exit 12
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 12 - I-15 North/Salt Lake; I-15 South/Las Vegas. Continue on the I-215 Belt Route for Cheyenne (Wyoming) and Ski Areas.

item.title: I-215 South - Exit 12
item.description: I-215 South approaching Exit 12 - I-15 South/Las Vegas;I-15 North/Salt Lake.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 301
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 301 - UT-266/4500 South.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 300
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 300 - UT-173/5300 South.
